content: **knitted hipster-hat for men in drops karisma the piece is worked bottom up with rib sizes s - xl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no u-916 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s/m - m/l - l/xl fits head size approx 54/56 - 56/58 - 58/60 cm **materials** drops karisma from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100-100-150 g colour 60 blue turquoise **knitting gauge** 23 stitches in width and 32 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm needles drops double pointed needles size 3 mm drops circular needle size 3 mm length 40 cm needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
